articles.title: Apple announces five major changes for iPhones in Europe. Details - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The regulations will ensure compliance with the Digital Markets Act (DMA).
articles.content: Apple has announced changes to iOS, Safari, and the App Store for iPhones, doing so to ensure compliance in the European Union (EU) with the Digital Markets Act (DMA), a new law that will take effect… [+1565 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Hogg
articles.title: BYD is coming for Europe—but high labor costs, connectivity issues, and stubbornly loyal customers might trip up the Warren Buffett-backed EV maker that’s leaving competitors in a ‘state of shock’ - Fortune
articles.description: BYD has terrified carmakers with its ultra-low prices, but conquering Europe is by no means assured.
articles.content: If you asked the typical European or American about BYD a couple of years ago, only the biggest petrol-head or an astute follower of Warren Buffetts portfolio could have given you a confident answer … [+7204 chars]
